channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bring Back Quiet Libraries
item.description: Lovers of silence need a refuge in a noisy world.

item.title: Russiagate Re-Revisited: Gabbard Urges DOJ to Prosecute Obama Officials
item.description: The director of national intelligence makes a frivolous argument.

item.title: No Matter How Hard Democrats Try, There Is No Such Thing As ‘Biblical Evidence’ For Abortion
item.description: Just because Jesus didn’t specifically use the word ‘abortion’ in his short ministry on Earth doesn’t mean he endorses it.

item.title: The Colbert ‘Conspiracy’
item.description: The cancellation was a sound business decision, even though progressives are convinced that greater forces were covertly at work.

item.title: Congressional Republicans Must Highlight the Winners of Trump’s Tax Bill
item.description: They should hold events, talk to people, and be evangelists for the good news hitting everyone’s paychecks and tax refunds.

item.title: Don’t Teach the Robots to Lie
item.description: New state AI laws are a warning about our civilization’s relationship to truth.

item.title: Trump Scores Big SCOTUS Victory Over Department Of Education
item.description: Trump’s attorney in the High Court, the Missourian John Sauer, has set a record for quickly and repeatedly prevailing.

item.title: 4 Reasons Chip And Joanna Gaines Shouldn’t ‘Normalize’ Gay Surrogacy
item.description: Same-sex couples must always seek to 'normalize' their families for the very reason they are not normal and never will be.

item.title: 5 Years Ago, The Russia Collusion Hoax Fell Apart
item.description: Five years ago today, the so-called 'primary sub-source' behind the infamous Steele dossier was identified, and the entire hoax collapsed.
